name: 「月相」-望
description: A W-Engine that prioritizes damage output over noise reduction. It can indiscriminately deal considerable damage to all units nearby.

name: 「月相」-晦
description: A W-Engine with excellent sonic and thermal energy usage, capable of hitting its target with a double whammy.

name: 「月相」-朔
description: A high-capacity portable W-Engine that can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator.

name: 「残响」-Ⅰ型
description: A special W-Engine featuring a built-in sonic generator that boosts its damage output.

name: 「残响」-Ⅱ型
description: A standardized W-Engine with balanced performance that enhances its owner's and their teammates' combat effectiveness in all aspects.

name: 「残响」-Ⅲ型
description: A special W-Engine that features motion capture algorithms, which enhance the overall combat competency of your squad.

name: 「湍流」-铳型
description: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it all at once.

name: 「湍流」-矢型
description: A tactical W-Engine that locates enemies using high-frequency sound waves. Its aiming aid can make its operator's precision attack more deadly.

name: 「湍流」-斧型
description: A frequency-converting W-Engine that can quickly generate excessive power and effectively increase its user's battle prowess.

name: 「电磁暴」-壹式
description: A special W-Engine that can analyze the target's weak spots through real-time calculations.

name: 「电磁暴」-贰式
description: A damage-type W-Engine that features an enhanced movement detection module that can quickly alter its output intensity to optimize battle efficiency.

name: 「电磁暴」-叁式
description: A high-capacity W-Engine that features a built-in generator, which allows it to keep a stable storage of electrical power.

name: 「恒等式」-本格
description: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat.

name: 「恒等式」-变格
description: A functional W-Engine that specializes in energy conversion. It can analyze combat environments and generate special sounds to disrupt the enemy's offense.

name: 「灰烬」-钴蓝
description: A W-Engine with a built-in heating component. When operating at high speeds, it resembles a blazing blue flame.

name: 街头巨星
description: A custom-made W-Engine designed for urban music lovers. It sacrifices heat dissipation components for improved sound quality.

name: 时光切片
description: A special W-Engine equipped with a high-speed camera module. The best choice for in-Hollow photography enthusiasts.

name: 雨林饕客
description: A consumer-class W-Engine launched by an exotic pet fan club to promote pet culture. Due to its cute appearance, it was once a very popular model.

name: 星徽引擎
description: A damage-type W-Engine made of special Etheric matter. When its user is attacked, it builds up energy.

name: 人为刀俎
description: A high-power W-Engine that boasts a cutting-edge energy conversion system. It collects excess heat and supplies it to the steamer.

name: 贵重骨核
description: A special W-Engine whose outer shell is made of composite Etheric matter that effectively absorbs impact, and turns it against the enemy.

name: 正版变身器
description: An epic W-Engine favored by Starlight Knight fans. Its high popularity and scarcity marketing strategy have caused an influx of knock-offs.

name: 双生泣星
description: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Its electrode cores made of recycled metals can release high-voltage charges.

name: 触电唇彩
description: This damage-type W-Engine boasts a built-in current transformer, and automatically attracts electrically sensitive objects around the operator and deals additional damage to them.

name: 兔能环
description: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. However, it is just an imitation of the real animal.

name: 春日融融
description: A special W-Engine equipped with a temperature regulator where residual heat generated by the W-Engine's high frequency is funneled into the hot springs on its surface.

name: 幻变魔方
description: The W-Engine, with its bright colors and great performance, saw poor sales at first because it resembled a toy. But with its reasonable price, it slowly gained a positive reputation.

name: 鎏金花信
description: A W-Engine with a grandiose and luxurious appearance equipped with a premium Ether-powered anti-theft device. It's actually used to provide the equipper with energy.

name: 电波漫步
description: Designed for those Hollow-dwelling bards who refuse to listen to the same albums repeatedly, this W-Engine comes equipped with a radio module that can transform Etheric frequencies into melodies.

name: 强音热望
description: Gather 'round, mortals! Turn up the music!

name: 光影刻刀
description: Clearly a W-Engine is for sound, and not images. What kind of lunatic genius would insist on stuffing a 16mm film camera into a W-Engine?

name: 德玛拉电池Ⅱ型
description: A customized W-Engine that focuses on energy storage, modified to improve its energy capacity. This model is often used by Anby.

name: 聚宝箱
description: A cost-effective W-Engine that can store energy, with improvements made to its internal space. This model is often used by Nicole.

name: 家政员
description: An enhanced W-Engine with a high rotation speed. A chainsaw has been integrated into its shaft. This model is often used by Corin.

name: 仿制星徽引擎
description: A customized supercomputing W-Engine, specialized in aim support and ballistic calculations. Modified by Billy, it now looks like some sort of knock-off Starlight Knight figurine.

name: 旋钻机-赤轴
description: Originally a rev-enhanced W-Engine, it has been modified by Anton with the most expensive rotary drill parts that allow it to exceed its output limits.

name: 比格气缸
description: A powerful protection-type W-Engine, characterized by thick oil cylinders that ceaselessly roar inside it. It can provide sufficient power for heavy machinery.

name: 含羞恶面
description: An intricate W-Engine developed by Section 6 and later modified with extra features. It can control Ether particles to form an energy field. This model is favored by Soukaku.

name: 好斗的阿炮
description: A support W-Engine propelled by jets that is both mobile and impactful, it can traverse the entire battlefield providing combat buffs.

name: 维序者-特化型
description: A defensive W-Engine independently researched and created by Public Security which simplifies the offensive components to enhance the energy conversion ability in its shield.

name: 轰鸣座驾
description: An energy W-Engine modded from spare parts of a truck's engine. It converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous.

name: 裁纸刀
description: An energy W-Engine modded from spare parts of a truck's engine. It converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous.

name: 震元奇枢
description: Pressing acupoints is like cooking. Striking the fatal acupoint is like setting the stove on fire, bringing disaster.

name: 加农转子
description: A high-performance supercomputing W-Engine, capable of collecting real-time battlefield data and equipped with mini cannons.

name: 逍遥游球
description: A new supercomputing W-Engine, featuring cutting-edge integrated chips that dynamically monitor the battlefield and provide tactical analysis for the user.

name: 左轮转子
description: A special W-Engine modeled after a revolver. It can load bullet-shaped condensed Ether batteries, which release a great amount of power when fired.

name: 钢铁肉垫
description: A supercomputing W-Engine equipped with a motion monitoring feature. Thanks to Nekomata's modifications, it perfectly matches the fast reflexes and combat maneuvers of feline Thirens.

name: 硫磺石
description: A W-Engine made for Soldier 11 by Obsidian Division. Its intense heat can be used to clear the entire battlefield.

name: 奔袭獠牙
description: A versatile W-Engine based on a motorcycle tire that Big Daddy made for Caesar.

name: 霰落星殿
description: Hail falls before the shrine, waking her. The blizzard is coming.

name: 燃狱齿轮
description: A functional W-Engine with ultra-high power capacity. Modified by Koleda, its energy level has almost exceeded the safety limit.

name: 拘缚者
description: A special W-Engine with a powerful temperature control system. Modified by Lycaon, it has the capability to quickly create extremely cold environments.

name: 焰心桂冠
description: A violent W-Engine that can ignite flames with a siphon. It deals simple and crude burn damage, encouraging relentless, bone-crushing follow-up attacks.

name: 灼心摇壶
description: Modified by Burnice, this W-Engine uses a special fuel as its power source to boost combustion performance to the max.

name: 嵌合编译器
description: The latest W-Engine that possesses a hypercalculation core. It can compile operational codes for machines at top speed. This model is favored by Grace.

name: 深海访客
description: A high-power W-Engine that possesses efficient freezing capabilities and high damage output. This model is often used by Ellen.

name: 残心青囊
description: Bitterness and pain beget hope, and he devours them all.

name: 啜泣摇篮
description: A special W-Engine with multiple layers embedded inside. It can quickly recharge 	special-model Bangboo and custom-made combat equipment. This model is favored by Rina.

name: 时流贤者
description: A new model of supercomputing W-Engine custom-made by HSO Section 6, equipped with the most elite calculation and analysis functions.

name: 防暴者Ⅵ型
description: The latest tactical W-Engine used by Public Security's elite Hollow squads, possessing a powerful Ether energy source. It's Zhu Yuan's favored model.

name: 玉壶青冰
description: A custom stun W-Engine made for an Automaton referencing the combat style and abilities of one. Energy is stored within, then lashes outwards upon conversion.

name: 淬锋钳刺
description: A deadly W-Engine from unknown sources, modified personally by Jane Doe with the intent to deal severe physical damage and Anomaly.

name: 千面日陨
description: Shadowed by darkness at every step, he laid bare his heart to kindle a single, flickering flame.

name: 玲珑妆匣
description: Underneath the radiant splendor, her genuine self has never been hidden.

name: 心弦夜响
description: The sound of the strings, sharp as blades, cut through the night, protecting the one.

name: 飞鸟星梦
description: A bird landed on the windowsill, scattering starlight from its tail feathers.

name: 索魂影眸
description: Broken eyes hold both resilience and vulnerability.

name: 青溟笼舍
description: The world is vast and full of change, and fate is unpredictable. But regardless of hardship or lack thereof, one must stay true to one's heart.

name: 牺牲洁纯
description: The sheen of silver is not innocence. Can the blades of the past cut through fate's connections?

name: 福虓炉炉
description: The warm fire blazes through the long night, casting light on the tiger's roar in my heart.
